paper_abstract: To understand multi-partite entanglement of the thermal state in the 1D spin 1/2 XY model with a transverse magnetic field, we investigate the temperature below which the thermal state is certainly entangled. We refer to such a temperature as a threshold temperature. We show that two characteristic lines in the phase diagram at zero temperature of the XY model can be clearly emphasized by the threshold temperature.
paper_title: Thermal enhancement of entanglement sensitivity to the phase diagram in XY model
